content.text: Information technology cabling shall be connected to equipment that incorporates safe signal circuitry  complying with the SELV circuit and the TNV requirements as defined in the EN 60950 series.
Equipment connected shall comply with the requirements for protection against electric shock of the relevant  product safety standards.
The connection of active equipment to information technology cabling shall not introduce hazards for users  or operators of the system.
